mapper.select: {call UPA_MOKA_PACKAGE_LIST_SEL( #{startDay, mode=IN, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=Date}, #{endDay, mode=IN, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=Date}, #{keyword, mode=IN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{catList, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{pkgDiv, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{scbYn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{userYn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{page, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{size, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{useTotal, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{total, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=java.lang.Long} ) }
